:2
if 167, 236 15395562 or 147, 236 15395562 or 127, 236 15395562 or 87, 236 15395562 or 67, 236 15395562 or 47, 236 15395562 or 167, 196 15395562 or 147, 196 15395562 or 127, 196 15395562 or 107, 196 15395562 or 87, 196 15395562 or 67, 196 15395562 or 47, 196 15395562 or 167, 216 15395562 or 147, 156 15395562 or 127, 156 15395562 or 107, 156 15395562 or 87, 156 15395562 or 67, 156 15395562 or 47, 156 15395562
goto 1
end_if

goto 2
:1
pause_script 18
pause_script 30
pause_script 36
pause_script 41
log hour min sec
wait 20000
resume_script 18
resume_script 30
resume_script 36
resume_script 41
end_if
